lead_paragraph: A. J. Price had 17 points to lead four Connecticut players in double figures last night and the No. 14 Huskies pulled away in the second half to beat visiting Pepperdine, 88-66, and remain undefeated.
snippet: A. J. Price had 17 points to lead four Connecticut players in double figures last night and the No. 14 Huskies pulled away in the second half to beat visiting Pepperdine, 88-66, and remain undefeated.
